name: PHProjectChangeRequest
desc: A request to change asset data in a Photos project extension.

items.name: init(project: PHProject)
items.desc: Creates a change request around the specified project.

items.name: var title: String
items.desc: The title of the change request.

items.name: var projectExtensionData: Data
items.desc: Compressed project-specific data to use in the change request.

items.name: func setProjectPreviewImage(NSImage)
items.desc: Updates the project preview in Photos.

items.name: func removeAssets<T>(T)
items.desc: Removes assets of a certain type from the collection.

items.name: func removeAssets(PHFetchResult<PHAsset>)
items.desc: Removes assets based on a fetch result.
